ValidationRule.description: Direct bill - Need Endorsement Documents Uploaded before moving to Delivered to Insured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c &&
AND( RecordType.Name <> "Health & Benefits",
ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Delivered to Insured"),
ISCHANGED(Stage__c),
Endorsement_Docs_Uploaded__c = FALSE,
ISPICKVAL( Billing__c, "Direct") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Error: Need Endorsement Documents Uploaded before moving to Delivered to Insured
